textBeforeTable: Cruise Itinerary Reviews Deck Plans Entertainment Dining Staterooms Itinerary Photo Gallery (27 reviews) / 5  4.0 View more Ports of Call: Civitavecchia (Rome), Italy Departing from: Azamara Journey There are no cruises available for the requested dates. We're sorry.
textAfterTable: Highlights: Elegant and intimate ships that are perfect to explore unique ports of call. A number of dining options from the intimate Discoveries restaurant, 2 specialty restaurants, Windows Café, pool grill and room service. Relax in the cozy Astral Spa, which offers numerous body treatments, a salon, fitness center and barber. Guest rave about the sumptuous cuisine, impeccable service and inviting common areas. Your Package Includes: Your package includes shipboard accommodations, port charges, entertainment and activities, enrichment programs, most onboard meals and room service, house wine at lunches and dinners, bottled water, specialty coffees and teas, shuttle bus service to/from port communities (where available), housekeeping and dining gratuities, and self-service laundry. It does not include personal expenses, alcoholic beverages, or government fees and taxes. View more
